snippet: Gilad Shalit, the Israeli soldier who was held in captivity for five years in Gaza, will join the popular Yediot Aharonot newspaper as a sportswriter.
abstract: Gilad Shalit, Israeli soldier who was held in captivity for five years in Gaza, will join the popular Yediot Aharonot newspaper as a sportswriter.
lead_paragraph: Gilad Shalit, the Israeli soldier who was held in captivity for five years in Gaza, will join the popular Yediot Aharonot newspaper as a sportswriter.

headline.main: Formerly Captive Israeli Soldier Now a Sports Columnist
headline.print_headline: Israel: Ex-Captive to Be a Sportswriter
